summary: This document is a fax from Shanita Hampton of Sprint Corporate Security to Joe Recarey of the Palm Beach Police Department, providing requested subscription information related to a case. The information pertains to specific phone numbers and a defined time period, indicating compliance with a subpoena.

persons.name: Shanita Hampton
persons.context: Shanita Hampton is the sender of the fax, providing requested information to the Palm Beach Police Department.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Joe Recarey is the recipient of the fax, representing the Palm Beach Police Department and requesting information for a case.

persons.name: Dale Figueroa
persons.context: Dale Figueroa is mentioned in relation to subscription information provided in the document.

connections.description: Shanita Hampton provides requested information to Joe Recarey as part of a subpoena compliance process.
Dale Figueroa is a subscriber whose information is being provided to law enforcement by Sprint.

events.title: Information Request
events.description: Sprint provided subscription information for the specified time period related to the case.

locations: 345 South County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: The document is a fax from Sprint Corporate Security to the Palm Beach Police Department.
It includes subscription information for Dale Figueroa for the date of May 18, 2006.
Shanita Hampton is the Subpoena Compliance Coordinator at Sprint.
Joe Recarey is an officer at the Palm Beach Police Department.
The document is subject to a protective order.
